Yarn/conversation.go.description: Conversation struct has mu sync.RWMutex for thread safety. Existing MessagesWithHiddenStates() method demonstrates the filter pattern: RLock, iterate messages, append matches, return slice copy.

Yarn/message.go.description: Message struct has Role (MessageRole), AgentID (string), Timestamp (time.Time), and Metadata (map[string]any) - all needed for the new filter methods.
